blueprint.description: Installs Cocoapods and sets up the Cocoapods Specs repository on macOS
blueprint.overview: [CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org/) is an application level dependency manager for Objective-C, Swift and any other languages that run on the Objective-C runtime, such as RubyMotion, that provides a standard format for managing external libraries.
blueprint.name: cocoapods
blueprint.title: cocoapods
